DOC.brief_summary: We aim establish reduction labor pain apply TENS acupuncture point first stage labour , assess efficacy , ascertain acceptability .
DOC.brief_title: Pain Relief Applying TENS Acupuncture Points During First Stage Labour
DOC.detailed_description: We conduct double-blind , placebo-controlled randomise trial involve healthy parturient term pregnancy use TENS 4 acupuncture point ( Li 4 Sp 6 ) ( n=50 ) placebo group ( n=50 ) . Visual analogue scale ( VAS ) use assess effect pain application , 30 minute 60 minute TENS . The objective parameter outcome score VAS decrease group . A post-partum questionnaire give 24 hour later evaluate satisfaction use pain relieve method next delivery .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion : Voluntary inform participation study An initial wish deliver without epidural analgesia Planned vaginal childbirth ( nonobstetrical complicate pregnancy ) Fetal vertex presentation Term pregnancy ( > 37 week gestation ) Apply 1st stage labour exclude cervical dilatation > 5 cm Age 20 40 year Chinese speaking , capable understand study No experience pain relief systemic epidural anesthesia previous delivery No experience acupuncture TENS field Had heart disease use pacemaker . Cervical dilatation > 5 cm Experience pain relief systemic epidural anesthesia previous delivery Experience acupuncture TENS field Had heart disease use pacemaker
